Description: Organic cationic surface product with potassium and sodium salts. Apply on the soil.
Chemical bactericide made of Streptomycin sulphate 90% and Tetracycline hydrochloride 10% SP.
Natural and organic antibiotic made of plant extracts. Improves natural immunity.
Broad-spectrum foliar fungicide made of Propiconazole 25% EC.
Dosage: 200 ml per acre or 1 ml per liter of water

Description: Contains Hexaconazole 5% SC. Acts as a tonic for plant growth and yield.
Contains Carbendazim 12% + Mancozeb 63% WP. Carbendazim acts systemically, Mancozeb works by contact action.
Dosage: 1 ml per liter of water or as seed treatment

Description: Contains Tebuconazole 250 EC (25.9% w/w). Inhibits reproduction and further growth of the fungus.
